  2. If fff is Riemann integrable, let R(f)R\p{f}R(f) denote the Riemann integral of fff over [a,b]\br{a, b}[a,b]. Then by definition, the Darboux sums must converge to R(f)R\p{f}R(f), so if mmm denotes Lebesgue measure,
